name: Comic Chevalier
description:
I scuffed my shoe against the rough concrete of the nearest building, avoiding the largest puddles in an effort to have my footsteps stay hidden by the rain. The place, a first floor apartment with shuttered windows surrounding the door, looked surprisingly pristine for such a run-down area.

Comic Chevalier is a detective game pulling inspiration from classic black and white noir films and the style of modern American comic books. 

 Gather evidence at the crime scene and use what you discover in order to solve the case at hand.  Talk to characters and hear our detectives inner thoughts with dialogue inspired by comic book  paneling and layout.

Use your discoveries back at your headquarters and connect related pieces of evidence together on your red string board to draw conclusions

Will you be able to solve the case at hand?
